statements: SELECT city, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT city, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY city ASC, date DESC;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT city, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 80 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE city = 'New York' AND temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT city, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM weather_data GROUP BY city HAVING avg_temp > 25
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 10
SELECT city, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM weather_data GROUP BY city ORDER BY max_temp DESC
SELECT city_name, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE city_name = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT city_name, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY wind_speed DESC;
SELECT city_name, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE city_name = 'Los Angeles' AND humidity < 50;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp FROM WeatherData WHERE date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT city_name, date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE city_name='New York' AND temperature > 80 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT city_name, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature < 60 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY city_name ASC, date DESC
SELECT city_name, AVG(temperature) AS average_temp FROM WeatherData GROUP BY city_name HAVING average_temp > 75
SELECT city_name, event_date, event_description FROM DisasterLogs WHERE city_name='Los Angeles' AND event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT city_name FROM WeatherData WHERE city_name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY city_name ASC
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT city_name, population FROM city_info ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT city_name, country FROM city_info WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT event_type, event_date FROM disaster_events ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT city_name, population, country FROM city_info WHERE population > 1000000;
SELECT city_name, country FROM city_info
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE date = '2022-08-15'
SELECT city_name, country, population FROM city_info WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT city_name, population, event_type FROM city_info JOIN disaster_events ON city_info.city_id = disaster_events.city_id
SELECT city_name, temperature, precipitation FROM city_info JOIN weather_data ON city_info.city_id = weather_data.temperature > 25
SELECT * FROM historical_weather_data;
SELECT city, temperature FROM historical_weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT city, date FROM historical_weather_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT city, humidity FROM historical_weather_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY humidity ASC;
SELECT city, temperature, humidity FROM historical_weather_data WHERE city='New York';
SELECT city, date, temperature FROM historical_weather_data
SELECT city, report_datetime, description FROM disaster_reports WHERE city='New York'
SELECT city, forecast_date, max_temperature FROM weather_forecast WHERE max_temperature > 30 AND city='Los Angeles'
SELECT city, device_type, status FROM smart_city_devices ORDER BY city ASC, device_type DESC
SELECT city, report_datetime, description FROM disaster_reports UNION SELECT city, forecast_date, 'No description' AS description FROM weather_forecast WHERE city='London'
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT city_name, population, elevation FROM city_data WHERE country='USA';
SELECT * FROM disaster_events WHERE event_type='Flood' OR event_type='Earthquake';
SELECT city_name, service_name, contact_number FROM emergency_services ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT city_name, average_temp, max_temp FROM city_weather_summary WHERE average_temp > 25 AND max_temp < 35;
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT city_name, population FROM city_data WHERE country='USA';
SELECT event_type, city_name, event_date FROM disaster_events WHERE city_name='New York' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT service_name, contact_number FROM emergency_services WHERE city_name='Los Angeles';
SELECT city_name, average_temp, max_temp, min_temp FROM city_weather_summary WHERE average_temp > 25 ORDER BY average_temp DESC;
